div.p: [I, Marcus Aureli]us Isidorοs [have signed]. Year x of Marcus Aurelius [Severus Alexand]er Pius Felix Augustus, Phamenoth 10+. (2nd hand) To NN and Chairemon alias Sarapodoros, [former gymnasiarchs, keepers of the property records of the] Arsinoite, [from Aurelius NN], a minor, of the district M[… through his father] Aurelius Sarapion, son of Eudaimon. [Under a public deed] executed through the archives here [today in the] metropolis in the district [Mo]er[is I have bought half share, common] and undivided, of a house and [… that has] collapsed, the price being x silver [drachmas …] Translation: N. Litinas, ZPE 186 (2013) 257
